upl_indicators.description: Denied reasonable accommodation request and sent lease termination notice
upl_indicators.violation: Unlicensed person making lease decisions affecting tenancy
upl_indicators.legal_basis: 18 VAC 135-20-165 defines licensed vs. unlicensed activities

upl_indicators.description: Denied reasonable accommodation request, stating requirements for interactive process
upl_indicators.violation: Unlicensed person making legal determinations about accommodation requests

upl_indicators.description: Senior Regional Manager overseeing multiple properties
upl_indicators.violation: Unlicensed person conducting property management activities

ra_denial_analysis.description: Denied reasonable accommodation request, stating requirements for interactive process
ra_denial_analysis.violation: Unlicensed person making legal determinations about accommodation requests
evidence: Legal terminology used (ADA, FHA, Fair Housing Act)

conclusions.violation_type: Unlicensed Practice of Real Estate - Property Management Activities
conclusions.summary: Edward Hyland (unlicensed) conducted multiple real estate activities including lease terminations, reasonable accommodation denials, and property management oversight without a license, violating 18 VAC 135-20-165
